constraints.name: interval_bound
constraints.description: 相邻元素之间的差值在给定范围内（马奶节和蜂蜜节的间隔年数约束）
constraints.formal: KL_i <= X[j] - X[i] <= KR_i (对于马奶节)，ML_i <= X[j] - X[i] <= MR_i (对于蜂蜜节)

constraints.name: min_transition_count
constraints.description: 最小化状态转移次数（最小化权力转移到同一王朝代表手中的次数）
constraints.formal: minimize count of transitions between 1 and 2 in the sequence
